# Community Building Activities

Fostering connection and collaboration is a key component of our curriculum. Explore the activities that bring our community together.

## Activities

### Day 1: Name Game

-   Share your name and a marine organism that represents you.

### Day 3: Adaptation Charades

-   Act out intertidal adaptations while others guess the organism.

### Day 6: Gratitude Circle

-   Reflect on your learning and express gratitude to peers.

These activities create a supportive environment for all participants. [Return to Homepage](index.qmd)
